column4: hello, dose anyone know how to specify what sound card to use in this os? I have 2 sound cards and I think it just automaticly chose one but its the wrong one
thats a good one
first, run gstreamer-properties and switch everything to use ALSA instead of OSS
after you did that gstreamer thing, you need to quit all apps using the sound card
yeah, 2 for ALSA and 2 for ALSA emulating OSS
